items.title: Secret Technique
items.description: The precise water temperature for perfect matcha is 70°C (158°F), not boiling as many believe.

items.title: Rare Fact
items.description: The most expensive tea ceremony bowl sold for $2.2 million at auction in 2017.

items.title: Hidden Tribe
items.description: The Awá people are an isolated indigenous group in the Amazon with only about 100 members remaining.

items.title: Medical Discovery
items.description: Scientists recently found a fungus in the Amazon that can break down polyurethane plastic.
